scripts.prepare: node -e "if (process.platform !== 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('npm run prepare:posix', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('Skipping prepare on Windows'); }"
scripts.prepare:posix: jq --argjson files "$(git ls-files | jq -R . | jq -s .)" '.files = $files' package.json > .package-tmp.json && mv .package-tmp.json package.json
